Articles.Content: Up until just a while ago, I had been controlling kerbals on EVA by using the mouse to point them in the direction i want them to look, but somehow that has changed and i now have to use the spacebar to reorient my kerbal every time i move the camera with my mouse, how can i undo this? I like being able to use my mouse as it was much more responsive
Can you infrom us about the version you are using? (btw in 1.2+ versions the "go the way you point your mouse" is activated by activating(?) kerbal's SAS)

This was all i needed! I thought I tried every key first, i guess not, thank you friend!
